title: Best of the Program | Guest: Chad Prather | 11/26/19
description:
A new poll shows Americans believe Epstein didn’t kill himself by a margin of 3 to 1! BlazeTV’s Chad Prather joins to discuss his newest special EXPOSING Jeffrey Epstein. At least Bernie is honest about his wealth tax – he’ll tax everyone making over $29,000 a year! Rep. Maxine Waters believes Trump-supporting neurosurgeon Ben Carson “lacks intelligence,” and Mark Cuban is buying web domains like “democracy.com” so no one can use them politically. And CBS is turning Stacey Abrams’ romance novels into a TV series.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
